trans-unit.source: The binding element that specifies the message version used to encode messages.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目，可指定用於編碼訊息的訊息版本。

trans-unit.source: Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 編碼是將訊息轉換成位元組序列的處理序，

trans-unit.source: Decoding is the reverse process.
trans-unit.target: 解碼則是相反的處理序。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 包含 SOAP 訊息的三種編碼類型：文字、二進位和訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM)。

trans-unit.source: Use this class if you want to implement a custom message encoder.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要實作自訂訊息編碼器，請使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: To implement your own custom message encoder, you must provide custom implementations of the following three abstract base classes:
trans-unit.target: 若要實作您自己的自訂訊息編碼器，您必須提供下列三個抽象基底類別的自訂實作：

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.Encoder%2A> to return an instance of your custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder>.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory.Encoder%2A>，以傳回自訂 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory%2A> method to return an instance of this factory.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory%2A> 方法，以傳回這個處理站的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Any type that derives from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> is responsible for updating the version of the SOAP binding in the WSDL document generated for the service.
trans-unit.target: 任何衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> 的型別都會負責更新針對服務所產生之 WSDL 文件中的 SOAP 繫結版本。

trans-unit.source: This is done by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext%29> method to modify the generated WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 藉由實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext%29> 方法來修改產生的 WSDL，即可完成此動作。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] provides three types of binding elements derived from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> class that can provide for text, binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) encoding.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 提供三種型別的繫結項目，這些繫結項目衍生自可提供文字、二進位和訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM) 編碼的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> 類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>: the most interoperable, but the least efficient encoder for XML messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>：互通性最佳、但效率最差的 XML 訊息編碼器。

trans-unit.source: A Web service or Web service client can generally understand textual XML.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務或 Web 服務用戶端通常可以瞭解文字 XML。

trans-unit.source: However, transmitting large blocks of binary data as text is not efficient.
trans-unit.target: 不過，將大型二進位資料區塊當做文字來傳輸是沒有效率的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement>: represents the binding element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for binary-based XML messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement>：表示繫結項目，這個繫結項目會指定用於二進位 XML 訊息的字元編碼和訊息版本控制。

trans-unit.source: This is most efficient but least interoperable of the encoding options.
trans-unit.target: 這是最有效率、但互通性最差的編碼選項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>: represents the binding element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for a message using a Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) encoding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>：表示繫結項目，這個繫結項目會為使用訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM) 編碼的訊息指定字元編碼和訊息版本控制。

trans-unit.source: MTOM is an efficient technology for transmitting binary data in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] messages.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 是在 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 訊息中傳輸二進位資料的有效技術。

trans-unit.source: The MTOM encoder attempts to balance efficiency and interoperability.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 編碼器會嘗試在效率和互通性之間保持平衡。

trans-unit.source: The MTOM encoding transmits most XML in textual form, but optimizes large blocks of binary data by transmitting them as-is, without conversion to text.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 編碼方式會以文字格式傳輸大部分的 XML，但是在傳輸大型區塊的二進位資料時，會依照原狀來傳送 (不轉換成文字)，好讓這些資料最佳化。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement>:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何實作衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> 的類別：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class initialized from an existing element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化從現有項目初始化之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to implement this constructor:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明如何實作這個建構函式：

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a factory for producing message encoders.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立產生訊息編碼器的處理站。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory" /> used to produce message encoders.
trans-unit.target: 用於產生訊息編碼器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory%2A>:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將說明如何實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory%2A>：

trans-unit.source: The typed object for which the method is querying.
trans-unit.target: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: 目前繫結項目的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.
trans-unit.target: 從通道堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The typed object <paramref name="T" /> requested if it is present or <see langword="null" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 要求的型別物件 <paramref name="T" /> (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for retrieving properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可要求型別物件，例如，用來從通道堆疊中的適當層次接收屬性或取得狀態的介面。

trans-unit.source: If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it.
trans-unit.target: 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。

trans-unit.source: If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何通道層支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29> method:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明如何實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29> 方法：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the message version that can be handled by the message encoders produced by the message encoder factory.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定此訊息編碼器處理站所產生之訊息編碼器所處理的訊息版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" /> used by the encoders produced by the message encoder factory.
trans-unit.target: 由訊息編碼器處理站所產生之編碼器使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: When binding elements are asked to process a message that has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> not returned by this property, it should throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當要求繫結項目處理擁有此屬性未傳回之 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 的訊息時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明如何實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion%2A> 屬性：
